fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dust Fingerprints (Night): Choose a dead player. You will learn all players that visited them the night they died.
- Criminal Research (Night): Choose a player. You will learn the names of all players that they have killed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not multitask
- While you are alive, all Unseen members will be privately informed of any modified causes of death or role flips of any dead players including roles that were withheld from the graveyard by cleaning or any other role obfuscation method.
